link_desc:
"MySQL-Monitoring-External Check" for Zabbix

This tool can be utilized to gather behavioral measurement data or configuration data of MySQL servers in a efficient way. It can be used as an external check for the zabbix monitoring system. The benefit for using this tool is a very low overhead for gathering the measurements because this tool is written in c and uses caching of values.

Detailed description available at: https://github.com/scoopex/mysql_extend

Overview about template: http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/scoopex/mysql_extend/blob/master/zabbix/3.2/Custom_-_Service_-_MySQL.html
